import React from 'react'; import ProblemPage from '../ProblemPage/ProblemPage'; const Problem2 = ({ handleProblemCompletion }) => { return (

Here are some hints to help you solve this puzzle:

Modern browsers support 140 named colors. Match each color to its color name.
Use the first letter of each color name to get the answer.
After finding the color name that is used for each item, use the first letter of each color name to get the answer.

nyc subway signage → Helvetica
memes → Impact
scientific journals → Times New Roman
film script → Courier
stop sign → Highway Gothic

Answer: HITCH
} >
); }; export default Problem2;
